text: Denver Dell Pyle (May 11, 1920 â€“ December 25, 1997) was an American actor, businessman and director. He was well known for his roles as Briscoe Darling Jr. in The Andy Griffith Show, as Jesse Duke in The Dukes of Hazzard during 1979-1985, as Mad Jack in the NBC television series The Life and Times of Grizzly Adams. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:1997 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Businesspeople from Colorado Category:Actors from Colorado
title: Denver Pyle
